about_the_game:
Prepare to take command of your own tank and dive deep into the annals of history with Steel Aces, the highly anticipated MMO tactical tank shooter that's set to redefine the gaming landscape. Developed by seasoned veterans of the genre, Steel Aces seamlessly combines strategy, simulation, and historical authenticity to offer gamers an unprecedented and immersive experience. Set to be available on PC Windows in 2024, the game also holds the potential for future expansion onto Mac, Linux, and various gaming consoles.

Unleash Your Inner Tank Commander with Free-To-Play Access

Steel Aces introduces a Free-To-Play model, granting global players access to the heart-pounding world of tank warfare. The game features a balanced monetisation approach, offering a diverse range of cosmetic options, including skins, decals, progression boosters, and exclusive collector's vehicles. With a multitude of customisation choices, players can tailor their gaming experience while supporting the continuous development of the game.

in-Game Screenshot

Embark on a Historical MMO Tank Adventure

Setting itself apart from the competition, Steel Aces delivers massive multiplayer tank battles that traverse various historical eras. From the trenches of WWI to contemporary war machines, players can engage in gripping campaigns inspired by real locations and historical events such as The Battle of Cambrai (1917), The Battle of Khalkhin Gol (1939), The Battle of Arras (1940), The Battle of the Bulge (1944), and The Battle of Chawinda (1965) and more.

in-Game Screenshot

Dynamic Environments Rooted in History

Steel Aces meticulously crafts key environments inspired by actual locations and historical occurrences. While some areas may be fictional, they remain plausible and engaging - ensuring players are not bogged down by excessive travel times during gameplay.

in-Game Recording

A Unique Proposition that Exceeds Expectations

Steel Aces is the culmination of extensive player feedback and insights, gathered by the experienced developers behind the game. Leveraging their collective expertise, the team has addressed common genre challenges, promising a more fulfilling and satisfying gaming experience. The game retains the core strengths that made tactical vehicle shooters popular in the 2010s while introducing changes, additions, and revisions to elevate it to new heights.

in-Game Screenshot

Key Features That Will Leave Players in Awe

Steel Aces offers a plethora of features that will captivate players, with these three mechanics taking centre stage:
  • Advanced Volumetric Armour: Immerse yourself in the intensity of tank warfare with a meticulously designed armour and ballistics system hand-crafted to provide a consistent experience, where different shell types have distinct effects on diverse armour configurations.
  • In-Depth Vehicle Knowledge: Master the intricacies of tanks by understanding armour layouts and interior components, providing players with a tactical edge on the battlefield.
  • Immersive Realism: Dive into the world of Steel Aces with animated moving parts, lifelike texturing, authentic engine sounds, explosive visual effects, and genuine crew communications, creating an unparalleled digital tank warfare experience.

in-Game Recording

Steel Aces goes further beyond these, ensuring players embark on an unequaled adventure.
Prepare to make history with Steel Aces, the ultimate MMO tactical battle tank shooter. Engage in epic tank battles, use the environments, and strategise your way to victory!

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: performance testing in progress
